name: Shoot out of space LD42
description:
Hey pug ! Defend your bones from Niancats!

Press Left and Right and roll.

Press Space and Pee !

Press H for H Bomb (it's a fake news).

This game is unfinished, but soon, it will be finish.

You can't lose, but you can't win netheir :)

I'm Netarion from France, it's my first GameJam alone. I don't make game everyday, be gentle.  Have Fun, and good luck for Jammers !
